name: 詹姆斯·维姆胡斯特
bio_short: 英国发明家和工程师。他设计并完善了“维姆胡斯特起电机”（Wimshurst Machine），这是19世纪末最著名、最高效的静电感应发电机。
bio_short_en: An English inventor and engineer. He designed and perfected the 'Wimshurst Machine', which became the most popular and efficient type of electrostatic induction generator in the late 19th century.
